content: The Daoist Mi is an optional Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the secret area of the Purple Cloud Mountain, the Daoist Mi will have a quest for you before you can face him in battle.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Daoist_Mi.md', within the main section titled 'Daoist Mi'.
The content is as follows:
The Daoist Mi is an optional Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the secret area of the Purple Cloud Mountain, the Daoist Mi will have a quest for you before you can face him in battle.
